name: Railroad Line Simulate
description:
Railroad Line Simulate

4 modes and 12 different maps

9 color lines and 12 types of stations and passengers

Design the optimal routes and transport passengers to station of the same shape

How to play: Touch the station and move your finger to the next station to create routes, and drag the train on the route, it will run automally.

Routes can be extend and edit or delete.

There are four modes
Normal mode: try your best to avoid the traffic jam
Time mode: Finish the task in time---transport enough passengers in time;
Limited mode: Routes can not be deleted except extend and edit;
Casual mode: design optimal routes,

Other: leadBoard and day and night modes;
